property.name: Text
property.value: (You may banish this card from your hand as an action to banish a Styled Event from your discard pile. If you do, play a copy of that Event.) POWER: Discard a card from your hand. Return this card to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Villains only. If this card is destroyed from your Life Deck you may place it into play.) POWER: If the highest power level on your MP's Level 4 is 500,000 or less, destroy the top 3 cards of your opponent's Life Deck. If your opponent controls no Setups, shuffle this into your Life Deck after use.

property.name: Text
property.value: (if this card is discarded from your hand during combat, place it into play.) CONTINUOUS POWER: Whenever you deal critical damage, you may choose a card in your opponent's discard pile and banish it. INSTANT POWER: Use after you discard a card from your hand by a Mastery effect. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is destroyed from your Life Deck by one of your effects, you may Rejuvenate it to choose a card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Life Deck.) POWER: Look at the top 5 cards of a player's Life Deck and put them back in any order. Rejuvenate the top card of your opponent's Life Deck. If it is not a Dragon Ball, banish it. SAIYAN: Raise your anger 2 levels.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (If this card is discarded from your hand during combat, gain 3 stages and choose 3 cards in your opponent's discard pile and banish them.) SHIELD POWER: Stops a physical attack. Raise your anger 1 level. Lower your opponent's anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may only have one 'Blue Agility' attached.) POWER: Attach to your MP. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. While attached, your physical attacks deal +1 stagte of damage and gain 'HIT: Lower your opponent's anger 1 level.'

property.name: Text
property.value: (When this card enters playing during combat, if it is the first time a card titled 'Blue Sword Mastery Drill' has entered play this turn then you may search your discard pile for an attack with 'Sword' in the title and place it into your hand.) CONTINUOUS POWER: Whenever you play a card with 'Sword' in the title, lower your opponent's anger 1 level.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. ALIEN: Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. DAMAGE: 5 life cards or 5 stages. HIT: If you have used the Power of a Drill to perform an attack this combat, you may draw a card. (Banish after use.)

property.value: INSTANT POWER: Use after your opponent lowers your anger. Pay 3 stages to raise your anger X levels. X = the amount of anger lowered. POWER: Gain 3 stages. ANDROID: Your attacks deal +1 life card of damage this combat. Choose a Styled card in your discard pile and shuffle it into your Life Deck.
